This tank is alright. I like the color, and they have several to choose from. The fabric is soft and it seems made well enough. For me, it hits a little too high on the neckline. I am not looking for something super low cut at all, but I have other tanks that are just a tad lower (more like the photo in their listing) that I like better. I think that the slightly lower cut looks better on me because I am short and top heavy. I will be returning this one because there are other brands that I like better, but if you prefer a more modest tank, this may be the one for you!

I snagged this tank top a few months back when it was still cold but I was prepping for a tropical vacay. Total win. The color has that muted blue-green that just says "chill" and the cropped length screams weekend vibes. The fit nails it-- like this tank has a personal mission to snuggle you without turning you into a sausage roll. I'm at that borderline between healthy and overweight, so feeling confident in a crop can be difficult but paired with a mid-high cut pant this top nailed it. The fabric is soft and even after a bunch of washes--no loose threads or fraying seams. Long story short, it's got the comfort, style, and durability trifecta. Highly recommend.

I bought this in 3 colors. I wrote a review, updated it, now I'm updating again. I wasn't sure I liked some of the colors cuz the fit seems different shirt to shirt but all in all they are nice, affordable crop tops that aren't TOO cropped. Perfect for what I'm looking for. Long enough to stay tucked into high waisted pants but cropped enough to give the "cropped" look. I'll buy more probably.
